original_text: The captain of the Lord's army said, ‘Remove your shoes from your feet. You are standing on holy ground.’ Joshua did that.
korean_text: 여호와의 군대 대장이 여호수아에게 이르되 네 발에서 신을 벗으라 네가 선 곳은 거룩하니라 하니 여호수아가 그대로 행하니라

sentences.original_text: The captain of the Lord's army said
Remove your shoes from your feet
You are standing on holy ground
